and design executi on str ategy managing bu dgets, directing  design resources and other third party

We would anticipat e a base salary for this role i ro. £130-140k  base.  
 
Instrumenta tion, Controls  & Automation  Manager  
The I CA Manager will lead all  elements of the el ectrical scope of work from design concept to installation 
ensuring that techn ology prov iders and any system integrato rs are working to a co -ordinated brief ensuring 
that the electrical system delivered is designe d to fit Fulcrum ’s requirements and ensure lessons learnt from

experience in working in a design function and be able to evaluate a range of technology providers to select

We would anticipat e a base salary for this role i ro. £120-130k  base.  
 
Contracts & Procurement Manager  
The C&P Manager will have e xperience of standard forms of contract  including the NEC suite, and w orking 
knowledge of construction procurement strategies, including tendering and contract strategies. Previous 
working experience within a similar environment such as refinery/oil & gas or petrochemical projects bring ing 
experience of putting pa ckag es together and participating in contract negotiation  is highly valued.  
 
We would anticipat e a base salary for this role i ro. £110-120k base.  
 
Health & Safety M anager  
The HSE Manager will lead, develop and implement health, safety, environmental, and security policies and 
procedures to ensure the safe ty and full  complian ce. Initially  focused on  the Ellesmere Port facili ty, the 
successful candidate  will have experience on process saf ety through all s tages of de sign concept, FEED and 
event ual operatio n which would then be reviewed, adap ted as needed  and rolled out across successive sites 
within the Europea n remit.  
 
We would anticipat e a base salary for this role i ro. £90 -100k base.  
 
A part of our approach will be to make sure when we identify candidates to keep a focus on the appropriate 
salary required for the  sector . As we discussed, we will make sure all the candidates are fully aware of the 
pitfalls but most importantly the opportunities going forwards . Finally , because of the requirement to get 
results as soon as possible we are fully prepared to dedicate time over the Chri stmas and new year period 
to get early traction in the process . Taking this approach will mean we can have a productive  project review 
beginning week 2 January .
